data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Asan, Guam will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Asan, Guam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Asan, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Asan, Guam to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Asan, Guam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Asan-Maina Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Asan-Maina Village, Asan, Guam.
Father, we pray that the state of Asan be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Asan, Guam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Asan, Guam has a population of 2,200.

We estimate Asan has 350 people who might know Jesus, 1,686 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 164 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Asan, Guam so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
